title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, gather requirements from stakeholders, and create a detailed project plan.

title: System Architecture Design for AdFlow Platform
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AdFlow platform, including components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations for scalability, maintainability, and security. The architecture should address functional areas: campaign management, content item approval, user management, and campaign auditing; also, ensure adherence to best practices in software design and development. This task builds upon 'Project Planning and Requirements Gathering'. Additionally, consider the use of microservices architecture for better scalability and maintainability, and include a detailed security plan with encryption strategies and access controls. The RFC is ready for review by the project manager or technical lead. This RFC also emphasizes the importance of ensuring modularity, testability, and maintainability throughout the design process. Upon approval, this RFC will be passed to the 'task-decomposer' for further task decomposition. To improve clarity, consider breaking down the functional areas (campaign management, content item approval, user management, and campaign auditing) into more specific subtasks.

title: Database Design for AdFlow
description: Design the database schema and data models for storing campaign, content, user, and audit data. Ensure the schema supports efficient querying, data integrity, and scalability. Consider indexing, normalization, partitioning strategies for optimized performance. Define relationships between entities and data access patterns. Provide recommendations for database technology (e.g., relational, NoSQL) based on project requirements such as performance, scalability, and security. Justify the choice of database technology by comparing its pros and cons with other alternatives. Incorporate guidelines for data backup, recovery, and replication strategies to ensure high availability and disaster recovery. Address security considerations like data encryption, access controls, and auditing mechanisms. Provide a high-level diagram illustrating the data architecture, including key entities and their relationships. Ensure that the design is flexible enough to accommodate future enhancements and expansions of AdFlow.

title: User Management Module
description: Develop the user management module, including user registration, authentication, and authorization.

title: Campaign Management Module
description: Develop the campaign management module, including campaign creation, scheduling, and reporting.

title: Content Approval Module
description: Develop the content approval module, including content submission, review, and approval workflows.

title: Campaign Auditing Module
description: Develop the campaign auditing module, including audit logging, reporting, and compliance checks.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures, such as data encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various modules, perform unit, integration, and system testing, and ensure overall system quality.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the production environment, implement continuous integration and deployment pipelines, and prepare for system launch.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials.
